data.name: [Code Golf] Shady Calculator
data.description:
# Similar kata
If you haven't made arithmetic operators from scratch before using bitwise operators, make sure to check [this problem](https://www.codewars.com/kata/584d618d52ee401a82000a05).
# Definition
Make a calculator capable of adding, subtracting, multiplying and dividing unsigned integers without using the characters `+-/*` or `exec/eval/imports/request/getattr/search/while/for/add/sub/mul/floordiv/div,builtins,global,local,eq`. Your code is also limited to `370` chars.
# Inputs
Integers `a`, `b` and operator `o` that can be any of the following: `+`, `-`, `/`, `*`.
# Outputs
The output is a signed integer result of the operation.
